Functions
setParams
sub setParams

This method sets the parameters for get_access_token_by_refresh_token command.  This module uses `request` method of OxdClient module for sending request to oxd.

Parameters
string $oxd_id

(Required) oxd Id from Client registration

string $refresh_token

(Required) Refresh Token from get_tokens_by_code command

string $scope

(Optional) Scope

string $protection_access_token

Protection Acccess Token. OPTIONAL for `oxd-server` but REQUIRED for `oxd-https-extension`

Returns

void

This module uses `getResponseObject` method of OxdClient module for getting response from oxd.

Example response from getResponseObject:

{ "status": "ok", "data": { "access_token": "fb5b52be-fd99-46b7-b87a-6167f86ae4bb", "expires_in": "299", "refresh_token": "49850248-ee70-4d21-85b2-949476c26e1b" } }
